SELECT
*
FROM
employeeinfo
LEFT JOIN
approval
ON
employeeinfo.approvalno = approval.approvalno
LEFT JOIN
vehicleinfo
ON
employeeinfo.id = vehicleinfo.id
WHERE
( employeeinfo.approvalno IS NULL
OR
approval.approvalcondi < 0 )
AND
employeeinfo.company = #{company}
ORDER BY employeeinfo.name

SELECT
*, IFNULL((SELECT employeeinfo.name FROM employeeinfo WHERE employeeinfo.id=vehicleinfo.owner), vehicleinfo.owner) AS inspecplace
FROM
vehicleinfo
LEFT JOIN
approval
ON
vehicleinfo.approvalno = approval.approvalno
LEFT JOIN
employeeinfo
ON
employeeinfo.id = vehicleinfo.id
WHERE
( vehicleinfo.approvalno IS NULL
OR
approval.approvalcondi < 0 )
AND
vehicleinfo.company = #{company}
ORDER BY vehicleinfo.vehicle

SELECT
*, rsvtmoney.rsvtmoneyseq AS operno, rsvtmoney.moneymoney AS atlm, rsvtmoney.moneymemo AS opercom, (SELECT customer.ctmname FROM customer WHERE customer.ctmno = rsvt.ctmno) AS opermemo, (SELECT rsvt.conm - SUM(rsvtmoney.moneymoney) FROM rsvtmoney WHERE rsvtmoney.rsvt = rsvt.rsvt) AS opertype, (SELECT SUM(rsvtmoney.moneymoney) FROM rsvtmoney WHERE rsvtmoney.rsvt = rsvt.rsvt) AS opertrash FROM
rsvtmoney
LEFT JOIN
approval
ON
rsvtmoney.approvalno = approval.approvalno
LEFT JOIN
rsvt
ON
rsvtmoney.rsvt = rsvt.rsvt
WHERE
( rsvtmoney.approvalno IS NULL
OR
approval.approvalcondi < 0 )
AND
rsvtmoney.moneyuser = #{opercar}
GROUP BY rsvtmoney.rsvtmoneyseq
ORDER BY rsvt.stday, rsvtmoney.rsvt, rsvtmoney.moneyindt

*, (SELECT customer.ctmname FROM customer WHERE customer.ctmno = rsvt.ctmno) AS opermemo
FROM

WHERE

OR
approval.approvalcondi < 0)
AND

ORDER BY rsvt.stday
